key_features: Earn 1.6% in unlimited cashback on transactions made in stores or online, locally or overseas.
No minimum spending required to earn cashback
No limit to the cashback you can earn
Cashback willl be credited automatically to your card account
petrol: Up to 16% off fuel savings at Caltex Petrol Stations
14% off fuel savings at Esso Petrol Stations
cash_back: No minimum spending and no cap on cashback
Cashback automatically credited to your card account
rewards: No minimum spending and no cap on cashback
entertainment: No minimum spending and no cap on cashback
grocery: No minimum spending and no cap on cashback
dining: No minimum spending and no cap on cashback
shopping: No minimum spending and no cap on cashback

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive Promotion is valid from 13-March-2025 to 31-March-2025
Applicable for New-to card holders only
Customers need to apply through MoneySmart to be eligible,
Charge at least 1 Qualifying Transaction to your card within 30 days of your application being approved

fees.annual_fee: S$196.20 a year (waived for the first year)
fees.supplementary_card_fee: S$98.10 a year (waived for the first year)

minimum_income.singaporean_pr: Singaporean/PR Minimum Income S$30,000 and above for Singaporeans and Singapore PR
minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income S$45,000 and above for foreigners
